notes: nominalized adjective; can mean "the last one"

example_sentence_english: I saw some last ones arrive.

example_sentence_italian: Il titolo dell'ultimo libro è interessante.
example_sentence_english: The title of the last book is interesting.
We are going to the last show.
I came back from the last trip.

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato un errore nell'ultimo paragrafo.
example_sentence_english: I found an error in the last paragraph.
There is a note on the last chapter.

notes: no contraction with con before l' in this form
